channel.title: Game Crashes on Blast Pit/Power Up?
channel.description: So I installed Black Mesa yesterday night and played through it till who knows the time of night. And got to Blast Pit. I defeated the tentacles and saved it while climbing down the ladder where the tentacles died. I saved my game and the next day (today), I went around all the radioactive pipes, turned the valve to replace the HUGE missing pipe and jump across. At THAT loading screen (which i believe may be the loading screen to the next level, Power Up) the game just crashes. I've tried restarting the game and restarting the computer. Every time I restart the game and loaded and retried (which after about 5 tries i saved it RIGHT before the loading point) it kept crashing, about 6 times and then I gave up. Any help here? Maybe I got a bad file or perhaps I'm just SOL and may have to restart the level? :fffuuu: I put a screenshot of the loading point in the attachment. EDIT: Just figured out that the game crashes WHENEVER I load. I started a new game on Blast Pit and the game crashed after loading the next area. ![2012-09-17_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://lXWRJEdM6LRuHjBhtmTXpLI8lQF.jpeg) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T4_20_34C0.mdmp (97.1 KB)
